channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MT

item.title: Report X-2023101172
item.description:
Report X-2023101172

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-21T18:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-13
  • City: BUTTE
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: WET BOX DISCOVERD BY PRELOADER. PACKAGE WAS PART OF BULK-STOP STACK OUT. OTHER HAZMAT PACKAGES GOING TO SAME CONSIGNEE WITH SAME HAZMAT DESIGNATION WERE NOT WET OR DAMAGED IN ANY WAY AS THIS ONE WAS. PACKAGE WAS WET AT BOTTOM OF OUTTER CARTON, AND EACH INNER CONTAINER SHOWED SPILLAGE WITH EACH ONE HAVING LIQUID PRESENT IN PLASTIC BAGS AND LABELS DETERIORTAED IN DIFFERENT PLACES.

item.title: Report X-2023101091
item.description:
Report X-2023101091

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-17T18:14:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-12
  • City: MISSOULA
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Box was found wet during trailer unloading and on the package's side opposite the directional arrows. Package was placed in a plastic spill container for processing. DescribePack: Crushed cap on 1 gallon bottle causing leakage of internal contents. Top portion of bottle. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PPE used to promptly clean up spillage release.

item.title: Report X-2023101020
item.description:
Report X-2023101020

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-16T18:13:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-10
  • City: BILLINGS
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package found wet and leaking. upon inspection 4 bottles of Athena Reset disinfectant were found with two bottles cracked causing leakage. DescribePack: cracks DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: in house clean up
